Detailed Description

The namespace for the engine. Contains every engine class, typedef, function, enum and everything you need.

Function Documentation

std::string Engine::operator+ ( std::string  str,
double  n 
) [inline]

Overloaded operator+, to ease exception throwing mainly. Appends a floating point number to a string.

Parameters:
str The string to append the number to.
n The double precision floating point number to append to the string.
Returns:
The resulting string.

int  n 
) [inline]

Overloaded operator+, to ease exception throwing mainly. Appends an integer to a string.

Parameters:
str The string to append the integer to.
n The integer to append to the string.
Returns:
The resulting string.
